issue_name: Datalogics File Parsing Vulnerability in Teamcenter Visualization and JT2Go

1.description: Update JT2Go to version V14.3.0.8 or later. Download from: https://plm.sw.siemens.com/en-US/plm-components/jt/jt2go/

2.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.1 to version V14.1.0.14 or later. Download from: https://support.sw.siemens.com/

3.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.2 to version V14.2.0.10 or later. Download from: https://support.sw.siemens.com/

4.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.3 to version V14.3.0.8 or later. Download from: https://support.sw.siemens.com/

5.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V2312 to version V2312.0002 or later. Download from: https://support.sw.siemens.com/
